The premier feel-good Sussex cover band

We're an energetic 4-piece function band playing an eclectic, electric playlist from more than five decades of party music. Our foot-stomping live act is full of infectious, sing-along melodies and highly dance-able tunes that are guaranteed to get you on the dancefloor.

The Great Fire are proud to be an independent group of musicians from Eastbourne, travelling the country to perform at pubs, festivals, parties, weddings and events.

Stacey Hollobone, Vocals

  • Instagram

A front woman whose unique energy and powerful soprano vocals set our set list alight.

Favourite Artists

  • Whitney Houston
  • Nerina Pallot
  • Jocelyn Brown

John Haynes, Guitar

  • Instagram
  • Twitter

A creative guitarist that blends soulful blues and squealing fuzzy rock with syncopated funk rhythmns.

Influences

  • John Mayer
  • John Frusciante
  • Cory Wong

Rick Baldwin, Bass

  • Instagram

Rick holds down the low end with a thick, funky bass tone and playing that's right in the pocket.

Influences

  • John Entwistle
  • John Paul Jones
  • Pino Palladino

Alex Knight, Drums

  • Instagram

Providing steady grooves, Alex’s rhythms are sure to get your feet moving.

Top Influences

  • John Bonham
  • Dave Grohl
  • Kevin Parker
